Let K be a complete non-archimedean normed field. Let L/K be an algebraic extension. Is there a theorem in Mathlib that shows that there exists a unique norm on L which is an extension of the norm on L?

I have already searched the folders Mathlib.Analysis.Normed.Field and Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Valued, but I haven't found any relevant theorems.
This is part of our joint project with @María Inés de Frutos Fernández , that is being PR'd. The theorem you mention is in this file in particular this theorem.
You should also consult María Inés' paper where the formalization is discussed.
Yongle Hu has marked this topic as resolved.
